GK16ujjvni_u:4179: vyatītya turyām api saṃśritānāṃ tāṃ pañcamīṃ prema-mayīm avasthām |
GK16ujjvni_u:4182: ity eṣa hari-bhāvasya vilāsaḥ ko'pi peśala |
GK16ujjvni_u:4183: citra-svapnam ivātanvan kṛṣṇaḥ saṅgamayaty alam // RUnm_15.220 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4185: ye'nubhāva-daśām asyāḥ prāpnuvanti rateḥ sphuṭam // RUnm_15.221 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4186: te tu sandarśanaṃ jalpaḥ sparśanaṃ vartma-rodhanam |
GK16ujjvni_u:4194: kula-sthitir alaṃ tu me manasi tāvad unmīlati |
GK16ujjvni_u:4196: na yāvad aparokṣatām idam apaiti vaktrāmbujam // RUnm_15.225 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4198: jalpaḥ parasparaṃ goṣṭhī vitathoktiś ca kathyate // RUnm_15.226 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4201: yad etā daśanair eṣa daśan nāpnoti maṅgalam // RUnm_15.227 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4204: kandarpasya vidagdhatāṃ vidadhatI netrāñcalasya tviṣā tvaṃ rādhe śiva-mūrtir ity urasi māṃ bhogīndram aṅgīkuru // RUnm_15.228 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4206: asminn adrau kati na hi mayā hanta hārādi-vittaṃ
GK16ujjvni_u:4208: yāḥ kākūkti-sthagita-vadanāḥ patra-dānena dīnās tūrṇaṃ dūrād anujagṛhire prauḍha-vallī-sakhībhiḥ atha sparśanam, yathā-
GK16ujjvni_u:4209: na kuru śapatham asya sparśato dūṣitoccair asi bhuja-bhujagena tvaṃ bhujaṅgādhipasya |
GK16ujjvni_u:4210: tanur anupama-kampā svedam abhyudgirantī kapaṭini paritas te paśya romāñcitāsti // RUnm_15.230
GK16ujjvni_u:4215: tvayā gantuṃ śakyā taraṇi-duhitus tīra-saraṇī // RUnm_15.231 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4219: vadhūś ca taḍid-ujjvalā prati-harid vayaṃ madhyataḥ sakhī-dhṛta-karāmbujā naṭati paśya rāsotsave // RUnm_15.232 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4224: vilasati tava vaśyā paśya vṛndāṭavīyam // RUnm_15.233 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4226: vyātyukṣīyudhi rādhayā ghana-rasaiḥ paryukṣyamāṇasya te mālyaṃ bhaṅgam avāpa vīra tilako yātaḥ kilādṛśyatām |
GK16ujjvni_u:4227: vaktrendau pratimā-cchalena śaraṇaṃ labdhaḥ sakhīṃ kaustubhas tan mā bhūś cakito vimukta-cikuraṃ nārdaty asau tvad-vidham // RUnm_15.234
GK16ujjvni_u:4235: navyā ca naur iti vacas tava tathyam eva |
GK16ujjvni_u:4237: tvaṃ cañcalo yad iha mādhava nāviko'si // RUnm_15.236 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4241: nīcair nyāsād atha caraṇayor nūpura mūkayantī dhṛtvā dhṛtvā kataka-valayāny utkṣipantī bhujānte
GK16ujjvni_u:4242: mudrām akṣṇoś cakitaṃ śaśvad ālokayantī smitvā smitvā harati muralīm aṅkato mādhavasya // atha vastra-cauryaṃ, yathā-
GK16ujjvni_u:4243: chadāvali-vṛtaiva naḥ sapadi kācid ekā vrajaṃ praviśya jaratīr ihānayatu ghora-karmoddhatāḥ
GK16ujjvni_u:4244: ayaṃ guṇa-nidhis taror upari tābhir abhyarcyatām
GK16ujjvni_u:4247: ayi jñātaṃ jñātaṃ harasi hariṇākṣi pratidinaṃ tvam eva pracchannā mama sumanasāṃ mañjarim itaḥ |
GK16ujjvni_u:4248: cirād diṣṭyā cauri tvam iha vidhṛtādya svayam ato guhākārām ārāt praviśa vasatiṃ prauḍhibhir alam // RUnm_15.240 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4250: ghaṭṭādhirājam avamatya vivādam eva yūyaṃ yad ācaratha śulkam adityamānāḥ |
GK16ujjvni_u:4251: manye vidhitsatha tad atra gires taṭeṣu durgeṣu hanta viṣameṣu raṇābhiyogam // RUnm_15.241
GK16ujjvni_u:4254: kuñje vañjula-śākhinaḥ śaśimukhī līnā varīvarti sā |
GK16ujjvni_u:4255: no ced eṣa tad-aṅghri-saṅgama-vinābhāvād akāle kathaṃ puṣpāmoda-nimantritāli-paṭalī-stotrasya pātrībhavet // RUnm_15.242 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4259: adiśata dṛśam eva tatra pātuṃ na tu vadanaṃ muhur arthitāpi tena // RUnm_15.243 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4261: keyaṃ śyāmā sphurati sarale gopakanyā kimarthaṃ prāptā sakhyaṃ tava mṛgayate nirmitāsau vayasyā
GK16ujjvni_u:4262: āliṅgāmūṃ muhuriti tathā kurvatī māṃ viditvā nārīveśam hriyamupayayau māninī yatra rādhā // kapaṭa-suptatā, yathā karṇāmṛte (21)-
GK16ujjvni_u:4268: jitvā dyūta-paṇaṃ daśaty aghahare gaṇḍaṃ mudā dakṣiṇaṃ sā vāmaṃ ca daśeti tatra rabhasād akṣaṃ kṣipanty abhyadhāt |
GK16ujjvni_u:4269: ājñāṃ sundari te yatheti hariṇā vāme ca daṣṭe tataḥ saṃrambhād iva sā bhujā-latikayā kaṇṭhe babandha priyam // RUnm_15.246 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4271: dhanyaḥ so'yaṃ maṇir avirala-dhvānta-puñje nikuñje smitvā smitvā mayi kuca-paṭīṃ kṛṣṭavaty unmadena |
GK16ujjvni_u:4273: niṣṭhīvan yaḥ kiraṇa-laharīṃ hrepayāmāsa rādhām // RUnm_15.247 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4277: danuja-ripur acumbad ambujākṣyāḥ kamalam ivānila-kampi cañcarīkaḥ // RUnm_15.248 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4284: na kucāv imau gatijitā tayā hṛtaṃ gajataḥ prasahya sakhi kumbhayor yugam |
GK16ujjvni_u:4290: adhara-raṅgaṇam aṅga varāṅgane pibatu nīpa-vanī-bhramaras tava // RUnm_15.251 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4295: sārdhaṃ rādhikayā harer nidhuvana-krīḍā-vidhir vardhate // RUnm_15.252 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4297: na tathā samprayogeṇa syād evaṃ rasikā viduḥ // RUnm_15.253 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4299: balena parirambhaṇe nakha-śikhābhir ullekhanaṃ haṭhād adhara-khaṇḍane bhuja-yugena bandha-kriyām
GK16ujjvni_u:4301: ratād api sukhaṃ harer adhikam ādadhe rādhayā // RUnm_15.254 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4303: narmotseka-kalādṛgañcala-camatkārī bhruvor vibhramaḥ saṃvyānasya vikarṣaṇ caṭulatāṃ karṇotpalenāhatiḥ
GK16ujjvni_u:4304: krīḍeyaṃ vraja-nāgarī-rati-guror gāndharvikāyās tathā bhūyiṣṭhaṃ suratotsavād api navāsvādaṃ vitene sukham // RUnm_15.255 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4308: ānandādhigamena manmatha-kalā-yuddhe'pi yasminn abhud udbhūtaḥ sa tayor babhūva suratārambhaḥ priyambhāvukaḥ // RUnm_15.256 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4313: ity ādyā vraja-devīnāṃ preyasī praṇayoktayaḥ // RUnm_15.258 //
GK16ujjvni_u:4315: spṛṣṭaḥ paraṃ taṭasthena rasābdhir madhuro mayā ||o||
